title.text: #-TBL Lite: A Small, Extendible Transformation-Based Learner

abstractContent.text: This short paper describes-and in fact gives the complete source for-a tiny Prolog program implementing a flexible and fairly efficient Transformation-Based Learning (TBL) system:

introductionContent.text: Transformation-Based Learning) is a well-established learning method in NLP circles.
This short paper presents a 'light' version of the #-TBL system -a genera/, logically transparent, flexible and efficient transformation-based learner presented in).
It turns out that a transformation-based learner, complete with a compiler for templates, can be implemented in less than one page of Prolog code.
